issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

Galaxy Tab (2.2.2) - [INFO] Titanium SDK version: 1.7.0 (03/21/11 08:55 3f9239e)

There are a few places where this behavior is seen.

  1. Base UI > Views > Image Views > Image File (tap image)
    1b. Base UI > Views > Alert Dialog (top 3 alerts)

2.tap the image
2b. tap the top 3 buttons

results: nothing occurs.
seeing W/TiUIDialog( 3528): (main) [253,124974] Window must have gone away." in adb

Works as expected in 1.6.1

{html}
fields.summary: Android: Galaxy Tab only - alerts fail to be invoked

comments.body: Closing ticket as invalid as this version of Kitchen Sink is no longer supported. There is now a new version of Kitchen Sink so if there are any problems, please file a new ticket.
